message.content:
cs.PL, cs.CE, cs.SE, cs.CR, cs.LG 

The paper discusses the formalisms for modelling the semantics of financial derivatives contracts, which involves programming language concepts and software engineering principles (cs.PL, cs.SE). It also involves cryptography and security (cs.CR) as smart contracts are executed on a blockchain. The paper evaluates and compares different formalisms, which requires statistical analysis and machine learning techniques (cs.LG). Finally, the paper proposes a new formalism for modelling smart contract semantics, which falls under the category of computational economics (cs.CE).
